{{Wireless embedded system |brand=PESI |model=WA222M |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/03/2002 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=unreleased? |type=access point, bridge |fcc_id=PQP-WA222M |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=ShareWave |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=4 MiB |ram1_brand=ICSI |ram1_model=IC42S16100-7T |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB (unk. standard - slave) |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=ShareWave |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand=RFMD |wi1_chip2_model=RF3000 |wi1_chip3_brand=RFMD |wi1_chip3_model=RF2948B |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=F3 |eth_chip2_model=FH3308 |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=10M |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |addl_chips= |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} "PCB-SW2250-A" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :There is a '''F3''' FH3308 10Mbit hub chip <small>(I think)</small> on the board.
Per the manual... *Configuration likely must be done via USB *This device would appear to been used / targeted for use with a '''DCT-5000''', whatever that is *The sample SSID shown is '''fortune'''. The sample MAC shown w/ '''ShareWave''''s utilities has a 00:D0:6C ('''ShareWave''') OUI.
Additional specifications, per the FCC manual, follow... *Receive Sensitivity: -85 dBm typ., -83 dBm min. *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::163 mm x 89 mm x 55 mm]]
